summary: A postman is mistaken for a dangerous criminal by the police.
cast: Shin'ichi Tsutsumi|Keisuke Horibe|Ren Osugi|Kyôko Tôyama|Sei Hiraizumi|Yôzaburô Itô|Konta|Akaji Maro|Yutaka Mishima|SABU|Hiroshi Shimizu|Ikkô Suzuki|Tomorô Taguchi|Ryoko Takizawa|Yoji Tanaka|Susumu Terajima|Akira Yamamoto|Ryo Yamamoto|Diamond Yukai
title: Posutoman burusu
